channel.title: Tags on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Tags on Metricly Docs

item.title: Element Tags
item.description: Send Element tags To send element tags, update the agent.yml found in the netuitived gem by uncommenting the elementTags line. This file is located at netuitived/config/agent.yml. Key/Value pairs should be added in the following format: name1:value1, name2:value2.
